mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO articleAlarm(articleIndex, commentIndex, nickname) VALUES(#{articleIndex}, #{commentIndex}, #{nickname})
REPLACE INTO commentAlarm(refIndex, commentIndex, nickname) VALUES(#{refIndex}, #{commentIndex}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT A.title as original, C.nickname, C.content, C.writtenAt FROM articles A, comments C WHERE A.articleIndex = C.articleIndex AND (A.articleIndex, C.commentIndex) IN (SELECT articleIndex, commentIndex FROM articleAlarm WHERE nickname = #{nickname}) UNION SELECT RC.content, OC.nickname, OC.content, OC.writtenAt FROM comments RC, comments OC WHERE RC.commentIndex = OC.refIndex AND (RC.commentIndex, OC.commentIndex) IN (SELECT refIndex, commentIndex FROM commentAlarm WHERE nickname = #{nickname}) ORDER BY writtenAt DESC;
